name: IT FISHES AT NIGHT
description:
IT FISHES AT NIGHT is a short, story based retro horror game about fishing. On your way to catch the big fish you've always wanted to snag, you meet a strange fisherman who quickly becomes a problem.

Can you escape?

WARNING: Jump scares and flashing lights

Some textures from opengameart.org

all other assets original

for GDIM31: Intro to Game Programming

by chiyeon

FISHING CONTROLS

WASD -> Move
Space -> Jump
Left Click -> Charge/Pull Fishing Rod
Right Click -> Cut Line
Tab (hold) -> Open Map
Alt (hold) -> Open Inventory

BOAT CONTROLS

W/S -> Increase/Decrease speed when in Boat
A/D -> Steer when in Boat
Space -> Brake
